channel.title: How to make objects in game (cammypvp)

item.title: How to make objects in game (cammypvp)
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
if(person.heightLevel == 0){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}}}
public void NewObjects() { //~ here
makeGlobalObject(2722, 3490, 0, 0, 10);
//makeGlobalObject(2721, 3491, 1096, 0, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2720, 3487, 3192, -2, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3221, 3226, 6951, 0, 10);
//makeGlobalObject(2841, 3177, 2465, 0, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2759, 3486, 409, -3, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2756, 3486, 8749, -1, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2737, 3477, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(2736, 3477, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(3213, 3221, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(3213, 3222, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(3217, 3218, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(3217, 3219, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(2758, 3490, 2213, -1, 0);
}

Its says x then y then item code. and i did that

@marcbob wrote:

The only thing I see wrong there is that it is an extra space long. I really doubt that did it but it is the only thing I can see and just make sure your not confusing the item id slot with a coord

item.title: How to make objects in game (cammypvp)

item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Okay so i am using cammy pvp. And I need to make a bank booth…
I found this and put my stuff in.

public void NewObjects() { //~ here
makeGlobalObject(2722, 3490, 0, 0, 10);
//makeGlobalObject(2721, 3491, 1096, 0, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2720, 3487, 3192, -2, 10);
makeGlobalObject(3221, 3226, 6951, 0, 10);
//makeGlobalObject(2841, 3177, 2465, 0, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2759, 3486, 409, -3, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2756, 3486, 8749, -1, 10);
makeGlobalObject(2737, 3477, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(2736, 3477, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(3213, 3221, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(3213, 3222, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(3217, 3218, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(3217, 3219, 6951, -1, 0);
makeGlobalObject(2758, 3490, 2213, -1, 0);
Last one is mine… i made it… saved and compiled and it wont show up. Please help
Thanks -owwch
